author: ☼︎Justice For Johnny Depp☀︎︎
text: This Johnny Depp vs Amber case has showed me that most people fight for justice or humanity only when it suits their narrative and not for everyone. Everyone deserves to be treated with respect irregardless of man or woman. It's a selfish mentality to have and it's self serving.
